name: Penguinland
description:
Penguinland is a game that I develop for my final year project. In it I put all my acquired knowledge and many more! I wanted to make a short but well-polished video game. 

I hope you like it! 

 Assets and tileset used:

https://craftpix.net/product/snow-2d-game-tileset-pixel-art/

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349

https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-1

https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-4

https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-6

https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions
